resp = client.indices.analyze(
    tokenizer="standard",
    filter=[
        {
            "type": "synonym_graph",
            "synonyms": [
                "dns, domain name system"
            ]
        },
        "flatten_graph"
    ],
    text="domain name system is fragile",
)
print(resp)
